title: Apps
description: Shopify CLI is a command-line interface tool that helps you build Shopify apps and themes. It quickly generates Shopify apps, themes, and custom storefronts. You can also use it to automate many common development tasks.

sections.title: Create a new app
sections.sectionContent:
You need node version 18.12.0 or higher to use Shopify CLI.

This installs Shopify CLI globally, so you can run shopify commands from any directory. Find out more about the available commands by running `shopify` in your terminal.

title: Shopify CLI
description: Shopify CLI is a command-line interface tool that helps you build Shopify apps and themes. It quickly generates Shopify apps, themes, and custom storefronts. You can also use it to automate many common development tasks.

sections.title: Requirements
sections.sectionContent:
- Node.js version 18.12.0 or higher
- Ruby version 2.7.2 or higher (Only for theme commands)
- Git version 2.28.0 or higher

sections.title: Installation
sections.sectionContent:
This installs Shopify CLI globally, so you can run shopify commands from any directory. Find out more about the available commands by running `shopify` in your terminal.

For app development you can also install the CLI locally to your project, find out more about that [Here](/docs/apps/getting-started/installation).

tabs.title: homebrew
tabs.code:
# Only for macOS
brew tap shopify/shopify
brew install shopify-cli

sections.title: Commands
sections.sectionContent:
Shopify CLI groups commands into topics and this is the syntax to run them: `shopify [topic] [command]`.
Check out the [Commands](/docs/api/shopify-cli/commands) section to see the list of commands available for each topic.

Or run the `help` command to get this information right in your terminal
We recommend to always use the latest version of the CLI if possible, run `version` to check the current version and if there are any update available and `upgrade` to install the latest CLI version.
sections.title: Upgrade your CLI

tabs.code:
shopify version
> Current Shopify CLI version: 3.50.0
> ðŸ’¡ Version 3.51.0 available!

shopify upgrade
